Adriana Johanny Murcia Santanilla

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3502129952530466
  • Última atualização do currículo em 21/08/2014

Possui graduação em TECNOLOGIA INDUSTRIAL - Universidad Tecnológica de Pereira (2009), obteve o titulo de mestre em engenharia metalúrgica e de materiais, na Escola Politécnica da Universidade de São Paulo (USP) e atualmente faz doutorado na mesma instituição. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Trabalhos completos publicados em anais de congressos
1.
SANTANILLA, A. J. M.; TENORIO, J. A. S. ; ESPINOSA, D. C. R. . SYNERGISTIC EFFECT ON EXTRACTION OF NICKEL AND COBALT FROM SYNTHETIC SULFATE SOLUTION USING DEHPA AND CYANEX 272 AS EXTRACTANTS. In: TMS 2014, 2014, San Diego, CA. TMS 2014 supplemental proceedings, 2014. p. 1157-1163.

2.
SANTANILLA, A. J. M.; GUIMARAES, A. S. ; PINI., R. A. ; MANSUR, M. B. ; TENORIO, J. A. S. ; ESPINOSA, D. C. R. . Metals Extraction Using Cyanex 272, Versatic 10 and Their Mixtures as Extractant. In: Hydrometallurgy 2014, 2014, Victoria, Canada. Proceedings of the 7th international symposium, 2014. v. II. p. 471-477.

3.
CORREA, M. M. J. ; CAMPOS, B. A. ; MORAES, V. T. ; SANTANILLA, A. J. M. ; ESPINOSA, D. C. R. ; TENORIO, J. A. S. . Solvent extraction applied to the recycling of mobile phones printed circuit boards. In: Hydroprocess 2012, 2012, Santiago. 4th international seminar on process hydrometallurgy. Santiago: Gecamin, 2012. p. 256-264.

4.
SANTANILLA, A. J. M.; MORAES, V. T. ; TENORIO, J. A. S. ; ESPINOSA, D. C. R. . Hydrometallurgical purification from Leach Liquor of Printed Circuit Board with Cyanex 272. In: TMS 2012, 2012, Orlando, Florida. TMS Proceedings 212 - 141st Annual Meeting & Exhibition. Hoboken, New Jersey: John Wiley & Sons, Inc., 2012. p. 597-603.

5.
SANTANILLA, A. J. M.; CAMPOS, B. A. ; TENORIO, J. A. S. ; ESPINOSA, D. C. R. . Recovery of nickel from leaching liquor of printed circuit board by solvent extraction. In: TMS 2011 - 140th Annual Meeting & Exhibition, 2011, San Diego, CA. Recycling of Electronic Wastes II - Proceedings of the second symposium, 2011. p. 39-44.

6.
SANTANILLA, A. J. M.; MORAES, V. T. ; TENORIO, J. A. S. ; ESPINOSA, D. C. R. . Printed circuit board recycling: Metals recovery by liquid-liquid extraction. In: 6th European Metallurgical Conference - EMC 2011, 2011, Düsseldorf. Proceedings of EMC 2011. Clausthal-Zellerfeld: GDMB, 2011. v. 4. p. 1481-1492.
